title: LC circuit - graph of capacitor electric field

content.question: A circuit is constructed by connecting a capacitor and an inductor. The electric field <math alttext="E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>E</mi></math> in the capacitor varies sinusoidally with time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. Times <math alttext="t sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="t sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="t sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="t sub D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> are indicated in the figure. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitude of the currents <math alttext="I sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="I sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="I sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="I sub D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> in the inductor at times <math alttext="t sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="t sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="t sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="t sub D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>t</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub D, close parenthesis, which is greater than I sub A, which is greater than I sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub C is greater than I sub A, which is greater than open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub D, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub B is greater than I sub A, which is greater than I sub C, which is greater than I sub D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub D is greater than I sub C, which is greater than I sub A, which is greater than I sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub C is greater than I sub A, which is greater than open parenthesis, I sub B equals I sub D, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 13.6: Circuits with Capacitors and Inductors (LC Circuits)

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
